header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Christmas plans, flying on Christmas day, Christmas food, roadkill deer, foxes,
header.activity: Friends talking about Christmas over a drink at home
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, anecdote telling, making arrangements, buying/selling
